HEB By the voices of archers down among the watering places, there they rehearse the righteousness of Jehovah, even the righteousness of His rulers in Israel. Then the people of the Lord went down to the gates.

Awake, awake, Deborah: awake, awake, utter a song: arise, Barak, and lead thy captivity captive, thou son of Abinoam.
HEB Then a remnant descended against the nobles; the people of the Lord descended for me against the mighty.
he made him that remaineth have dominion over the nobles among the people: the

Why abodest thou among the sheepfolds, to hear the bleatings of the flocks? For the divisions of Reuben
Gilead abode beyond Jordan: and why did Dan remain in ships? Asher continued on the sea shore, and abode in his breaches.
jeoparded their lives unto the death in the high places of the field.
fought, then fought the kings of Canaan in Taanach by the waters of Megiddo; they took no gain of money.
They fought from heaven; the stars in their courses fought against Sisera.
The river of Kishon swept them away, that ancient river, the river Kishon. O my soul,

shall Jael the wife of Heber the Kenite be, blessed shall she be above women in the tent.
She put her hand to the
, and her right hand to the workmen’s hammer; and with the hammer she smote Sisera, she smote off his head, when she had pierced and stricken through his
At her feet he bowed, he fell, he lay down: at her feet he bowed, he fell: where he bowed, there he fell down dead.
The mother of Sisera looked out at a window, and cried through the lattice, Why is his chariot
long in coming? why tarry the wheels of his chariots?
Her wise ladies answered her, yea, she returned answer to herself,

divided the prey; to every man a damsel

as the sun when he goeth forth in his might. And the land had rest forty years.
